author: shreyaslondhe
content: I have a question, what if I as a validator am selected in the IL committee for slot *n*, What if I am not active during that period or willingly do not participate in the FOCIL as there is no reward for it atm, what would happen in such case?

author: terencechain
content: Nothing really happens, it's just a no-op to the protocol. It makes the inclusion list welfare less effective
